required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: β-hydroxy-β-methylbutyrate-enriched Nutritional Supplements for Obesity Adults
clinical_study.official_title: β-hydroxy-β-methylbutyrate-enriched Nutritional Supplements for Obesity Adults During Weight Loss: a Randomized Double-blind Placebo-controlled Clinical Trial

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this study is to assess the effectiveness and safety of HMB-enriched nutritional supplements for improving muscle mass and muscle function in Chinese adults with obesity during the weight loss process using calorie restriction.

primary_outcome.measure: The mean change in whole-body skeletal muscle mass (SMM)

secondary_outcome.measure: The mean change in appendicular skeletal muscle mass (ASMM)
secondary_outcome.description: These data will be measured using InBody 770 (Biospace Co., Seoul, Korea).

secondary_outcome.measure: The mean change in trunk skeletal muscle mass (TSMM)
secondary_outcome.description: These data will be measured using InBody 770 (Biospace Co., Seoul, Korea).

secondary_outcome.measure: The mean change in total body fat mass (BFM)
secondary_outcome.description: These data will be measured using InBody 770 (Biospace Co., Seoul, Korea).

secondary_outcome.measure: The mean change in total appendicular body fat mass (ABFM)
secondary_outcome.description: These data will be measured using InBody 770 (Biospace Co., Seoul, Korea).

secondary_outcome.measure: The mean change in trunk body fat mass (TBFM)
secondary_outcome.description: These data will be measured using InBody 770 (Biospace Co., Seoul, Korea).

secondary_outcome.measure: The mean change in basal metabolic rate (BMR)
secondary_outcome.description: These data will be measured using InBody 770 (Biospace Co., Seoul, Korea).

secondary_outcome.measure: The mean change in phase angle (PA)
secondary_outcome.description: These data will be measured using InBody 770 (Biospace Co., Seoul, Korea).

secondary_outcome.measure: The mean change in body weight (BW)
secondary_outcome.description: These data will be measured using InBody 770 (Biospace Co., Seoul, Korea).

secondary_outcome.measure: The mean change in handgrip strength (HGS)
secondary_outcome.description: A trained nurse will measure HGS using a digital handheld dynamometer (EH101; Xiangshan Inc, Guangdong, China) to the nearest 0.1 kg .

secondary_outcome.measure: The mean change in waist circumference
secondary_outcome.description: A trained nurse will measure waist circumference using a tape at the level midway between the lower rib margin and the iliac crest with the participant breathing out gently.

secondary_outcome.measure: The mean change in hip circumference
secondary_outcome.description: Hip circumference was measured as the maximum circumference over the buttocks

secondary_outcome.measure: The mean change in physical activity
secondary_outcome.time_frame: From the beginning to weeks 3, 6, 9, and 12.
secondary_outcome.description: It will be measured using self-reported International Physical Activity Questionnaire Short Form (IPAQ-SF).The International Physical Activity Questionnaires (IPAQ) comprises a set of 4 questionnaires. Long (5 activity domains asked independently) and short (4 generic items) versions for use by either telephone or self-administered methods are available. The purpose of the questionnaires is to provide common instruments that can be used to obtain internationally comparable data on health related physical activity.

secondary_outcome.measure: The mean change in the score of the sit-to-stand test
secondary_outcome.description: A trained nurse will perform the 30-second sit-to-stand test ,which is a classic test for measuring the performance of lower extremity muscles.

secondary_outcome.measure: The mean change in energy intake
secondary_outcome.time_frame: From the beginning to weeks 3, 6, 9, and 12
secondary_outcome.description: It will be measured for all participants using the self-reported Food Frequency Questionnaire (FFQ)

secondary_outcome.measure: The mean change in lipid profiles
secondary_outcome.description: It will be tested using standard method.

secondary_outcome.measure: The mean change in fasting glucose
secondary_outcome.description: It will be tested using standard method.

secondary_outcome.measure: The mean change in fasting insulin
secondary_outcome.description: It will be tested using standard method.
It will be tested using standard method.
It will be tested using standard method.

arm_group.description: The participants will receive oral HMB-enriched nutritional supplements (65 g once daily)
The participants will receive a placebo (maltodextrin 65 g once daily) with the same package as the intervention.

intervention.description: The participants will receive oral HMB-enriched nutritional supplements (65 g, once daily), which include soybean isolate protein, flaxseed oil powder, yam powder, whey protein, oligomeric isomaltose powder, cocoa powder, medium-chain fatty acid powder, calcium beta-hydroxy-beta-methylbutyrate, sunflower seed oil powder, L-glutamine, wheat germ powder, membrane isolated casein, wheat oligopeptide, konjac flour, vitamin E, vitamin D, stevioside, edible flavors.
Placebo (maltodextrin 65 g once daily) with the same package as the intervention.
Caloric restriction diet with individualized nutritional guidance from professional dietitians by video regarding caloric restriction strategies
